camel.sink.endpoint.action.name: camel.sink.endpoint.action
camel.sink.endpoint.action.description: Action expression when using timer type

camel.sink.endpoint.decrement.name: camel.sink.endpoint.decrement
camel.sink.endpoint.decrement.description: Decrement value expression when using counter type

camel.sink.endpoint.increment.name: camel.sink.endpoint.increment
camel.sink.endpoint.increment.description: Increment value expression when using counter type

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.value.name: camel.sink.endpoint.value
camel.sink.endpoint.value.description: Value expression when using histogram type

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.micrometer.lazyStartProd.name: camel.component.micrometer.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.micrometer.lazyStartProd.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.micrometer.basicProperty.name: camel.component.micrometer.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.micrometer.basicProperty.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.micrometer.metricsRegist.name: camel.component.micrometer.metricsRegistry
camel.component.micrometer.metricsRegist.description: To use a custom configured MetricRegistry.
